name: Alexander Graham Bell
what_did:
Bell invented the telephone, which let people talk to each other over long distances.
He also worked on ways to help deaf people learn to speak.
He loved science and kept trying new ideas all his life.
why_matters:
Bell changed how people communicate.
His invention of the telephone made the world feel more connected.
He also helped people with hearing problems live better lives.
